text:
the procedure is then: (1) compute the region with ICP, (2) approximate with lazysets using a polyhedron or with the lazy CH array depending on the type of safety property, (3) compute the flowpipe with ReachabilityAnalysis and intersect it with such state.

if you want to write it i can guide you

text: very cool, thank you! At the moment it is a paragraph in the ICP.jl tutorial. What if we wrote this as its own tutorial and put it under the applications section? My idea was that `applications` would have more "advanced" tutorials which are not just "this function works like this", but actually have some context and describe an application. I think this might be a nice fit there
